short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension powered by Open AI to analyze & perform actions based on your active tab's content, enhancing browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover the next-level browsing experience with Tab GPT, the AI-powered Chrome extension that transforms the way you engage with online content. With custom prompts, quick actions, and GPT-driven AI capabilities, Tab GPT allows you to effortlessly summarize, ask questions, and extract information from any web page. Maximize your online productivity and get the insights you need at your fingertips, all while only paying for the OpenAI API usage you consume.

- GPT-powered AI for advanced content analysis and action execution.
- Custom prompts for versatile interactions with the content on your active tab.
- Quick prompts for easy access to your most-used commands.
- Seamless Chrome extension integration to enhance your browsing experience.
- Free usage, with users only paying for the OpenAI API Key usage to ensure cost-effectiveness.
